definition: Hanukkah (Chanukah), 8 day Jewish holiday starting on the 25th day of Kislev (can occur from late Nov up to late Dec on Gregorian calendar)/also called 哈努卡節|哈努卡节 and simply 哈努卡
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Jewish people celebrate the holiday of Hanukkah.
Chandler: Well, I'll stay, but only because I wanna hear about Hanukkah .
sentences.chinese: 好，我留下，不过我想听光明节的故事。

sentences.english: It was the first night of Chanukah and the night before Ellie's last final.
sentences.chinese: 那是光明节的第一个晚上，也是艾莉期末考试的前夜。

sentences.english: Hi, Jim. Do you know about Hanukkah ?
sentences.chinese: 嗨，吉姆。你知道光明节吗？

sentences.english: "Joy to The World" includes songs for Christmas and Hanukkah.
sentences.chinese: “欢乐世界”包括圣诞节和光明节的歌。

sentences.english: And that my friends, is the true meaning of Hanukkah.
sentences.chinese: 而我的朋友们，那就是光明节的真正意涵。

sentences.english: My niece gets a small gift each night of Hanukkah and of course spins the dreidel.
sentences.chinese: 我侄女在光明节的每个晚上都能得到礼物。

sentences.english: Can you tell me something about Hanukkah?
Hanukkah is an eight-day Jewish holiday in December.
sentences.chinese: 光明节是一个为时八天的犹太教节日。

sentences.english: Part of the tradition of Hanukkah is eating a lot of fried food.
sentences.chinese: 光明节的一个传统就是吃很多油炸的食品。

sentences.english: We wish you many blessings this Christmas or Hanukkah.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望你能更多地祝福此圣诞节或光明节。

sentences.english: By Eileen GoltzIt was the first night of Chanukah and the night before Ellie's last final.
sentences.chinese: 那是光明节的第一个晚上，也是艾莉期末考试的前夜。

sentences.english: Menorah, a special candleholder, is a symbol associated with the celebration of Hanukkah.
sentences.chinese: 七分枝圣烛台是光明节庆典的一个标志。

definition: Advent (Christian period of 4 weeks before Christmas)
Hanukkah (Chanukah), 8 day Jewish holiday starting on the 25th day of Kislev (can occur from late Nov up to late Dec on Gregorian calendar)/also called 光明節|光明节 and 哈努卡節|哈努卡节
Lent (Christian period of forty days before Easter)
Yom Kippur or Day of Atonement (Jewish holiday)
Assumption of the Virgin Mary (Christian festival on 15th August)
